programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Rupert And The Clockwork Dragon - Ming is hurt when Rupert and friends appear to prefer Bill's new toy dragon to her. But when the toy gets them lost in the woods they discover there are some things that only a real dragon can do.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Rupert And The Moon Adventure - With the sun low in the sky, Rupert waves to Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Ming as they join him at his cottage. They are all going to stay up late to see something very special – an eclipse of the moon. Bill is just explaining what an eclipse is when Raggety arrives. In his impatience, he does not want to wait for the moon to rise. He wants to see it straight away. Raggety does elf magic to see the moon at once but promptly vanishes. The others think he is playing a trick and hiding from them, but when Bill looks through the telescope, keen to see the start of the eclipse he gets a shock. Raggety has got his wish to see the moon. His magic has taken him there! How will Rupert and friends get him back down before the eclipse shrinks the moon down to nothing? It is a race against time to save their little elf friend.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep31
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Can - All the animals are having a nap. But Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo aren't tired and want to play… will they have enough energy to last until everyone else wakes up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep32
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Whistle Worries - Raa Raa is determined that he can copy all the noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle… until he hears Topsy whistling. Try as he might, Raa Raa just can't whistle. All his jungle friends help Raa Raa to learn to whistle.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep5
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Pancake Party - Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car. Even worse, Ted Glen's amazing Pancake Machine has run out of mix so Sara won't be able to run the race unless Pat can get to Greendale on time... But Pat gets waylaid by Alf's cows and the pancake mix ends up all over the road. Pat hurries back to Pencaster but Michael now only has butter and flour so Pat has to go and get eggs from Nisha and even some milk from Rosie the goat! With the race about to start, Pat arrives just in time with all the ingredients necessary for Ted to make Sara a fresh pancake. SDS Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep83
programme.desc: Fifi'S Pancake Fun - Fifi and Pip are busy making pancakes. But every time they flip one it disappears, where could they be going?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep84
programme.desc: Pip'S Pony - Pip wants a pony. He tries adapting his scooter and Violet even makes him a hobby horse. But nothing is quite right. Until Fifi points out the silver horse made out of stars in the night sky.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep31
programme.desc: The Fangtom Menace - Pieface's first sleepover in the Den is troubled by spooky tales of a frightening Fangtom AND Walter with a demolition gang determined to flatten the Den!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Gnashernal Treasure - The class dig up a mysterious time capsule which sends them into a frenzy to find the hidden treasure before Walter or a greed-crazed Paul the Potato can thwart them.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep16
programme.desc: Shiro'S Escape - The team sets off to a new planet where they hope to find information on Shiro's past

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep16
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter Three - Rocky, Bullwinkle, Boris and Natasha are kidnapped by a super-fan named Francis, the eight-year-old heir to the Puffy Platypus Pizza franchise, to play a private concert for his birthday.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep16
programme.desc: Buster Move / Gills! - Smoove Move is embarrassed when his nerdy brother comes to visit.// Skidmark causes a panic when he hunts a snail-eating goldfish at a fancy party.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep13
programme.desc: Night - The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep13
programme.desc: The Primrose Classic / The Blimpateers - A professional paper airplane thrower hires Archibald to be his caddie. While floating through the sky, Archibald bumps into birds who live in a blimp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Troublesome Treachery Of The Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.desc: End Of The Dragon Master - Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep14
programme.desc: Gran The Unfriendly Ghost/Bad Sandy - Gran is sick of the Croods not listening to her advice and fakes her own death. But, when the Croods don't mourn to her liking, she haunts them/Ahhh! Valley threatens to exile Sandy after a string of bad behavior unless the Croods can get her under control

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep13
programme.desc: Podlings / Dumpster Dining - Oh's family reunion ends up turning into a disastrous family Tip and Oh secretly turn Lucy's craft store into a trendy new Boovian restaurant.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom - Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep51
programme.desc: Why Meerkat Is Always On The Look Out - You see there was a time when Meerkat was not always on the lookout. Meerkat used to race around Tinga Tinga bumping into things and causing chaos. She never stayed still long enough to listen to any beast. But then one day Meerkat bumps into the Sleeping Stones... and they make her listen alright! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep52
programme.desc: Why Cheetah Has Tears - You see there was a time when Cheetah didn't have tears. She was the fastest animal in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Cheetah was faster than even the Wind. Every year Cheetah and Wind would race to see who was the fastest and every year Cheetah would win. Until one day.... Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep51
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unfunny Clown - Noddy and his friends are having a “clown day” and everyone is going to play at being clowns. Noddy shows Fuse his smelling flower joke but Fuse realises he isn't programmed to understand clowning. The clowning goes too far when someone sets up a bucket of balls joke that almost causes an accident. Noddy needs to investigate to find out who is the unfunny clown before a ‘joke' goes too far. Using all his detecting skills and reconsidering evidence, Noddy works out that the unfunny clown is actually Fuse! He didn't realise that the clowning jokes he was playing on the other toys weren't actually funny! Noddy shows Fuse a way in which he can join in with the clowning in a safe way and Clown Day can go ahead after all. Well done Noddy! Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep52
programme.desc: Noddy And The Case Of The Raining Carrots - Farmer Tom is having a Farm Fair at the Animal Acres Farm but it looks set to be ruined by an unexpected shower of carrots, cabbages and then pumpkins. Noddy and Deltoid investigate and discover the raining vegetables are caused by Smartysaurus, who is trying to find something heavy enough to go on the other end of her see-saw. She didn't realise that every time she sat on one end of the see-saw, she was sending the vegetables on the other end flying up into the air. Clever Noddy realises that Deltoid and Smartysaurus are matched in weight and are, therefore, the ideal partners to play on the see-saw. The friendly dinosaur is delighted and the Farm Fair can go ahead without any more raining vegetables- thanks to Noddy! Case closed!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep51
programme.desc: Why Are Acorns Buried Under The Tree? - Jess and the puppies find a pile of acorns buried under a tree. The puppies want to play with them, but Jess thinks they should find out why the acorns are buried there first. That's the Big Question! Baa and Billie don't know – Billie says she'd eat acorns rather than bury them! Jess goes off to see Mimi who's planting her conker to grow a chestnut tree. Jess wonders if someone planted the acorns to grown into an oak but Mimi doesn't think so. They'd need to be buried somewhere with more space to grow. Jess tries Willow who is storing apples for the winter. She explains that she'll eat the apples when food is scarce in the winter months. Jess wonders if someone is storing the acorns. He and the puppies go back to the tree and wait. Soon a Squirrel pops out from the tree and buries another acorn. Jess and the pups are glad they didn't play with the acorns. Squirrel's storing them for Winter. They've answered the question – yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep52
programme.desc: How Can I Sound Like Brown Bird? - Brown Bird sings a lovely song before leaving for winter migration. Jess would love to sound like Brown Bird – then they could listen to her song all year round. But how can he sound like her? That's the Big Question. Billie and Baa suggest Jess sings but his singing voice doesn't sound like Brown Bird at all. Mimi tries to mimic Brown Bird by whistling but that's not the right sound either. Maybe if Jess makes a hooty sound by blowing through his paws? That's still not the right sound. Jess tells his friends that it's more of a whistley sound – a bit like the wind whistling through the reeds at Horace's pond. So they go to the pond. Horace shows Jess how to blow through the reeds – and it sounds just like Brown Bird. They've found the Answer. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Rupert And The Grumbleclouds - Rupert goes to meet Bill who seems very grumpy. Bill has grumble clouds over his head. Edward is the next one to have a dark, purple cloud over his head and he becomes very sad. Ping Pong tries a spell and the clouds break up and go away but then they return above everyone's head. Everyone gets the grumps except Rupert and Ming. Rupert and Ming try to make the others laugh and succeed with their disastrous magic show. Everyone starts laughing and they all cheer up!

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Rupert And The Playful Wind - Rupert, Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill meet a young wind, Gustus. All of the grown up winds are too busy making weather and Gustus has no one to play with so he gets very bored and mischievous and causes chaos with his wind. Rupert shows Gustus some games he can play using his wind in a more productive way.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep33
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Hiccups - Raa Raa can't get rid of his hiccups. Can his friends help him?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep34
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo'S Wriggly Jiggly Game - Topsy is having a party and Raa Raa is helping organise the games. But not everybody is good at them. Can Raa Raa and his friends come up with new games that all the friends are good at and enjoy?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire – the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success – even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep8
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep85
programme.desc: Aunt Tulip'S Carnival - All the tots are excited as Aunt Tulip is holding a Caribbean themed carnival. But will the weather hold long enough for them to have their celebrations?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318

programme.desc: Miss Croner attempts to help Theodore discover his true calling in life.

programme.desc: Jeanette is suddenly the clumsiest person on the planet. Is there something wrong with her, or her new glasses?

programme.desc: Theodore gets roped into doing Alvin's babysitting sitting job with a spoiled four year old.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Kevin agrees to be Alvin's assistant to get closer to the music industry, but ends up running errands instead.

programme.desc: SpongeBob tries to take a shortcut to work, but becomes lost along the way. // After failing his driver’s test again, Mr. Krabs decides to teach SpongeBob how to drive himself.

programme.desc: The Supies! Swellview's biggest night for superheros, and Captain Man is not invited. Danger Force enlists Henry's help to make sure the night goes off without a hitch!

programme.desc: Dal must gather an unlikely crew for their newfound ship if they are going to escape Tars Lamora, but The Diviner and his daughter Gwyn have other plans.

programme.desc: Once Carlitos falls asleep, Carl and CJ must conduct all their playing - and fighting - in absolute silence!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep313
programme.desc: The family tries to stop their notorious chismoso Hector from gossiping all over town but can he stay quiet?

programme.desc: Tired of doing favors to get a ride from Lori, Lincoln decides it's time to help Leni pass her driver's test. // Lincoln conspires with the rest of his sisters to overthrow Lori's tyranny as their 'baby'sitter.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Lincoln devises a plan to get the best seat in the car for a long, family, road trip. // Lincoln tries to prove he's mature enough to have dinner at the adult table, leaving the kiddie table behind him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239
programme.desc: When a gang of kids steals the Krusty Krab's grill, SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs go to extreme lengths to win it back. // SpongeBob helps out the Krusty Krab's night shift crew, but the customers crave something creepier than usual.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep240
programme.desc: SpongeBob visits his old pal Bubble Buddy's hometown... Bubbletown! // Sandy invites Karen and Mrs. Puff out for a night on the town, so the ladies decide to blow off some steam.

programme.desc: Parker tends to a small strawberry garden until its survival is threatened by a horde of ravenous birds. // Parker discovers Angus can't swim, but with the little nimbus' help, the sailor's on his way to becoming a buoy.

programme.desc: When a fancy new grocery store opens on the block, Bobby rallies the family to do everything they can to compete. // Ronnie Anne fakes being sick to watch a Lubra Libre match, which proves to be more difficult than anticipated.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Convinced that their scrapbook isn't good enough for Dad's birthday, the Loud kids seek out the perfect gift. // Lily hears the parents mention ice cream if the kids are good, so she uses baby smarts to avert sibling disasters

programme.desc: Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep102
programme.desc: When Annie tries to stop Pony from being nosy, she creates a bigger problem that puts him in danger! // When Annie takes pity on a lonely friend and lets her spend the day with Pony, she worries her friend is better at taking care of Pony.

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Pony becomes a video game master, but when their friends are in danger Annie and Pony need to use their gaming skills to save them. // When Pony thinks he turned into a unicorn, Annie uses him to raise money to save their sports court from closing.

programme.desc: It's time to restock the secret Krabby Patty ingredient, and it is SpongeBob's duty to make sure the ingredient is delivered safely to the Krusty Krab. // Plankton has a customer who eats at the Chum Bucket every day.

programme.desc: Shifu tells the citizens of the Valley of Peace that whoever can defeat Po before sunset will become the new Dragon Warrior. When Hundun hears of the challenge, he returns to the village to claim the title.

programme.desc: A Lemonade Stand In Big Sky Park/Migration Frustration In Big Sky Park - Rob and Stomper run out of water for lemonade, then go on a desert adventure to find more.

programme.title: Mush Mush And The Mushables Ep114/Ep137
programme.desc: Bird Call/The Mysterious Seepod - Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep3/Ep7
programme.desc: The Secret Of The Ghost Rig/In Fear Of The Phantom - A mysterious Ghost Trucker is terrorizing Crystal Cove.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep29/Ep34
programme.desc: The Night The Clown Cried Ii: Tears Of Doom/Night On Haunted Mountain - Crybaby Clown is back with a vengeance. He's kidnapping all sorts of folks all over Crystal Cove: namely a therapist, a hairdresser, a plastic surgeon, and a publicist!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep13/Ep39
programme.desc: When The Cicada Calls/Wrath Of The Krampus - Bugs are taking over Crystal Cove and attacking some of its most prominent citizens.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Theatricals Ep8/Ep20/Ep30/Ep42/Ep63/Ep70/Ep93/Ep102
programme.desc: Busy Buddies/The Dog House/Flirty Birdy/Is There A Doc In The Mouse/Million Dollar Cat/Much Ado About Mousing/Salt Water Tabby/Southbound Duckling - Tom and Jerry try to protect a precocious baby when he wanders around the house.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep98/Ep60/Ep19/Ep40/Ep63
programme.desc: Best Best Friends/Batkitty/License To Punch/Roadtrip Ruckus/First Flight - Master Frown and Brock attend a friendship-themed competition intending to ruin it for everyone else, but soon discover their own friendship in need of repair.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep120/Ep162/Ep203/Ep121/Ep162
programme.desc: Bubbles of the Opera/Home, Sweet Homesick/Ragnarock And Roll/Sister Sitter/Home, Sweet Homesick - When Bubbles gets a bad school photo, it sends her into an existential tailspin of darkness.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep120/Ep159/Ep199/Ep221/Ep255
programme.desc: Shhh!/King Koil/Franken-Fight/Xingo Nation/Growing Up Is Hard To Do - While relaxing at a monastery with a no-noise policy, Ben can't keep quiet and accidentally awakens a dangerous dragon hidden in a secret chamber below the hallowed halls.

programme.title: Chowder Ep10A/Ep31B/Ep20B/Ep41B
programme.desc: Sniffleball/Gazpacho Fights Back/Creme Puff Hands/The Blast Raz - Mung forces Chowder to play sports with the other kids. Beset by Panini's kisses and Gorgonzola's taunts, Chowder has to figure out a way to escape the game and get back home.

programme.title: Inspector Gadget Ep205A/Ep210A/Ep215A/Ep220A/Ep226A
programme.desc: Cooking with Claw/Get Smarts/The Claw Who Stole Christmas/Fate It Til You Make It/Inspector Gadget Goes to Jail - When the world's greatest chefs start to go missing, Gadget takes up a chef's position at a restaurant in order to bait the kidnappers.

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep19/Ep7
programme.desc: Frankie My Dear/Store Wars - Mac and Bloo develop crushes on Frankie and compete for her love.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep20/Ep61/Ep88/Ep42/Ep101
programme.desc: Too Many Unikitties/Trapped In Paradise/Unikitty And The Ice Pop Factory/Memory Amok/The Very Best Candy - Unikitty implants her brainwaves on her friends.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep121/Ep163/Ep204/Ep140/Ep161
programme.desc: Sister Sitter/Memory Lane of Pain/Bucketboy!/The Squashening/The Bubbles-Sitters Club - When Blossom and Bubbles get sick, Buttercup volunteers to take care of them for the day.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep121/Ep160/Ep200/Ep222/Ep256
programme.desc: Bright Lights, Black Hearts/Reststop Roustabout/Buggin' The Buggs/Heads Of The Family/The Hex Factor - Ben, Gwen and Max stop by the graveyard set of Gwen's favourite TV show, The Unalivers. Before long, Ben discovers its lead, Michael Morningstar, is an energy vampire.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep4/Ep8
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Man Crab/The Grasp Of The Gnome - While hosting a volleyball tournament for Trickell's Triquid diet mixture, a smooth drinking beverage that's just like water (except not so fatty!)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep30/Ep35
programme.desc: Web Of The Dreamweaver/Grim Judgement - A rash of strange crimes happen when a number of prominent Crystal Cove citizens destroy the things they love most!

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep222/Ep233

programme.desc: Nepal - Snowland Children - After ten years away from their families, three Nepalese teenagers return to their mountain village. They were sent to a boarding school in Kathmandu at the age of four. Now they must learn to reconnect with their families and tradition.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Grasso vs. Araujo
programme.desc: Main Event - Since moving to the flyweight division, Mexico’s Alexa Grasso has been unstopabble, defeating Ji Yeon Kim, Maycee Barber and Joanne Wood. On October 15 at the APEX in Las Vegas, the Top Five ranked Grasso will make her case for a 125-pound title shot when she battles Brazil’s Viviane Araujo in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night. Also holding down a spot in the flyweight rankings, Araujo has already faced former world titleholders Alexis Davis, Jessica Eye, Roxanne Modafferi and Katlyn Chookagian, and she expects a win over Grasso will earn her a crack at the crown
